While this does work really well as a reader, DO NOT use this if you do any type of web development with HTML or CSS. The Dark Reader will inject CSS into your source code and make your pages dark all the time. I didn't realize it was doing this until a colleague of mine visited a page I had worked on, and it rendered part of it in dark mode for them and they did not have the extension installed. BE CAREFUL! It's a great "reader", but I wish it didn't inject CSS/HTML into source code editors ... Show more

*Edit*
FOR SALESFORCE: open darkreader > click more > click FILTER or FILTER+ > click the option to apply to current website only (optional)
